topics.body: So I'm on a movie binge day; here's a random question: if you were a movie villain what sort of movie villain would you be?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
And now we have been introduced to the Final Boss of Gash Bell.
[spoiler]A weird looking motherfucker named Clear Note.
!obdpictures1.wikispaces.com/file/view/Base_Clear.png/207646456/Base_Clear.png![/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5449686d6368720c18720000#post_5449686d6368720c18720000
The knightly kind. One who challenges the hero to a fair and honorable duel. Never resorting to underhandedness or trickery and facing his defeat with pride in his eyes.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544968ca6368720ac27f0000#post_544968ca6368720ac27f0000
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5449686d6368720c18720000#post_5449686d6368720c18720000
The knightly kind. One who challenges the hero to a fair and honorable duel. Never resorting to underhandedness or trickery and facing his defeat with pride in his eyes.[/bq]
Personally I'd be the good guy version of Dr Breen.  What I mean by this is have massive followers who fight you instead and instead have a extremist anti-corrupt government to the point you'd have civilians throwing bricks at you for trying to stop.  Still technically evil, but even knowing full well I was the villian the citizens would rather have me in power.
